result.title: [Coder's Calendar] Firefox and Chrome extension for Competitive Programming
result.content:
Hi all,
Coder's Calendar is a Chrome and Firefox extension that I've made,which displays details of upcoming and ongoing coding competitions. Currently shows details of contests on Codeforces, Topcoder, Hackerearth, Hackerrank and Codechef.

Coder's Calendar is available for download at:

  • Chrome Extension : https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/coders-calendar/bageaffklfkikjigoclfgengklfnidll
  • Firefox add-on : https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/coder-calendar/

Star the project on Github to show your support:
https://github.com/nishanthvijayan/CoderCalender

Please comment if you find any bug or if you don't like any feature.

UPDATE: As requested by many users,I've added the option to filter out websites.Update the extension to see the changes
Click the settings icon on the header to open the options.
